description: Works as expected. Thanks for awesome tool. Congratulations to team behind it.
summary: Powerful tool to deploy Qt projects

description:
Enabled all permissions.

Guide: "After running the QtDeployer, the contents of the folder with your application should look like this:". Well it doesn't!

All cqtdeployer does, is copy the program.

 Whatever you do with qmlDir you always get: "Warning: Failed to extract qml! The qt qml dir is not initialized!" 

Do you expect a qml folder in the program source folder? You know fully well qt does not create a qml folder on Windows and neither on Linux.

Manual is poorly written. cqtdeployer itself has many grammar mistakes. If you're going to do something, do it properly or don't do it at all asshole.

очень убдобно деплоить зависимости qt 
Внимание если у кого не работает то нужно поставить его как класическое приложение

Начиная с версии 1.2.3 все работает корректно )
Спасибо за утилиту.
